name: 2CPay
author: ZonalHost

sections.description: 2CPay is a wordpress plugin which provides payments via 2Checkout for Woocommerce stores. This plugin provides payments via hosted page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/2cpay’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Click on Settings on Plugins screen OR go to Woocommerce->Settings->Checkout->2CPay.
  4. Now put your 2Checkout Store Id(i.e. Account No.) and Secret Word in the form and enable the payment gateway.
  5. Login to your 2Checkout account and change the settings Account->Site Management->Checkout Options->Direct Return to ‘Given links back to my website’
sections.faq:
Do I need to pay for this plugin?

No, You don’t need to pay anything for this plugin however you can purchase the pro version which has some extra features.

Is free version fully supported?

Yes, Free version is fully supported with no extra cost. You will receive all future updates at no cost.
